text: Is there a way to get the time stamps and current objective function value for a MILP in JuMP using CBC? I’d like to plot this to see how much better the solution is over time.

elements.text: Is there a way to get the time stamps and current objective function value for a MILP in JuMP using CBC? I’d like to plot this to see how much better the solution is over time.

text:
This is generally done via a callback. I'm sure callbacks are supported in Cbc/Cbc.jl though.
Worst case you can always parse the solver's log.
